story:
Once upon a time, in a small village in India, there lived a young girl named Maya. Maya was a cheerful and kind-hearted girl who loved to explore the world around her. Every night before going to bed, Maya's grandmother would tell her stories about the wonders of the world.

One night, as the sky filled with twinkling stars, Maya's grandmother told her a special story about a magical peacock. This peacock had shimmering feathers that glowed in the moonlight and a melodious voice that could soothe even the weariest soul.

The magical peacock lived deep in the heart of a lush forest, surrounded by colorful flowers and gentle butterflies. People from far and wide would come to hear its enchanting song, which brought peace and joy to all who listened.

One day, Maya decided she wanted to visit the magical peacock and hear its captivating song for herself. With determination in her heart, she set off on a journey through the dense forest, guided by the light of the stars above.

After a long and adventurous journey, Maya finally reached the clearing where the magical peacock lived. As she approached, the peacock turned towards her and sang the most beautiful song she had ever heard. The melody filled her heart with happiness and lifted her spirits high.

From that day on, Maya would often visit the magical peacock in the forest, finding solace and comfort in its enchanting song. And every night before bedtime, she would close her eyes, remembering the melodious voice of the peacock that brought peace and joy to her soul.

And so, dear child, remember that magic can be found in the most unexpected places, and that a kind heart and a curious spirit can lead you to wondrous adventures. May your dreams be filled with the beauty of the world around you, just like Maya's were. Goodnight, sweet child. Sleep well and dream of magical peacocks and endless possibilities.
